title: BYD recalling 97,000 top-selling EVs on steering component fault, regulator says
description: BYD is recalling nearly 97,000 electric vehicles in China due to a manufacturing fault in the steering control unit that could pose fire risks. The recall affects Dolphin and Yuan Plus models produced between November 2022 and December 2023. Dealers will install a physical fix in the recalled cars.
